divs: Sighting DetailsWe were walking tonight and saw a red and oragng fireball looking craft glowing in the sky!!It flew around dissapeared,than reappeared in another location just to the right,we watched it for about 40 seconds,and than it went upwards and dissapeared!! Almost as if it turned into a star!! We waited a little while to see if it was going to reappear but nothing yet..It was gnarly!!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Capistrano Beach
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: We were walking tonight and saw a glowing red and orange light .It dissapeared than reappeared,than flew slowly for a few seconds than accended up than dissapeared!!
